mapper.update:
UPDATE `request_record_info` SET
`trace_id` = #{set.traceId},
`request_path` = #{set.requestPath},
`request_method` = #{set.requestMethod},
`spend_time` = #{set.spendTime},
`status` = #{set.status},
`remark` = #{set.remark},
`result_code` = #{set.resultCode},
`result_msg` = #{set.resultMsg},
`business_type` = #{set.businessType},
`server_ip` = #{set.serverIp},
`client_ip` = #{set.clientIp},
`created_by` = #{set.createdBy},
`date_created` = #{set.dateCreated},
`updated_by` = #{set.updatedBy},
`date_updated` = #{set.dateUpdated},
`serial_no` in
#{item} and
(
`Serial_no` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Serial_no` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`trace_id` in
#{item} and
(
`Trace_id` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Trace_id` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`request_path` in
#{item} and

) and
(
`Request_path` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`request_method` in
#{item} and
(
`Request_method` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Request_method` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`spend_time` in
#{item} and
`spend_time` >= #{where.spendTimeSt} and
`spend_time` <= #{where.spendTimeEd} and
`status` in
#{item} and
(
`Status` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Status` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`remark` in
#{item} and
(
`Remark` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Remark` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`result_code` in
#{item} and
(

) and
(

) and

) and
(

) and
`business_type` in

) and

`Business_type` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`server_ip` in
#{item} and

) and
(
`Server_ip` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and

) and
`created_by` in

) and
(
